description: Panel für das 2. Semester des Forschungsprojekts

targets.query:
from(bucket: "hsebucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "libiotrace")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["jobname"] == "${jobname}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["processid"] == "${ProzessID}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "function_name" or r["_field"] == "time_diff" or r["_field"] == "traced_filename")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["functionname"], set: ${functionname:json}))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "time_diff")
  |> drop(columns: ["_measurement", "hostname", "jobname","_start", "_stop", "_time"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({Zeit: r._value, Funktion: r.functionname }))
  |> group(columns: ["Funktion"]) 
  |> sum(column: "Zeit") 
  |>group()

from(bucket: "hsebucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "libiotrace")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["jobname"] == "${jobname}" and r.functionname =~ /.*MPI.*/)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({"Prozess_ID": r. processid, "name": r.hostname}))
  |> group(columns: ["Prozess_ID", "name"], mode:"by")
  |> distinct(column: "Prozess_ID")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({"Prozess ID": r.Prozess_ID, "Hostname": r.name}))

prozesse = from(bucket: "hsebucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "libiotrace")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["jobname"] == "${jobname}" and r.functionname =~ /.*MPI.*/)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({"Prozesse": r. processid, "Hosts": r.hostname}))
  |> distinct(column: "Prozesse")
  |> count(column: "_value")
  |> rename(columns: {_value: "Anzahl Prozesse"})


hosts = from(bucket: "hsebucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "libiotrace")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["jobname"] == "${jobname}" and r.functionname =~ /.*MPI.*/)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({"Prozesse": r. processid, "Hosts": r.hostname}))
  |> distinct(column: "Hosts")
  |> count(column: "_value")
  |> rename(columns: {_value: "Anzahl Hosts"})


union(tables: [hosts, prozesse]) // Kombiniere beide Tabellen
|> yield(name: "combined")

mpitime = from(bucket: "hsebucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "libiotrace")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["jobname"] == "${jobname}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["processid"], set: [${ProzessID:doublequote}]))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["functionname"], set: ${functionname:json}))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "time_start" or r["_field"] == "time_end")
  |> group(columns: ["time"], mode:"by")  
  |> sort()
  firstEntry = mpitime |> first() // Hole den ersten Eintrag
  lastEntry = mpitime |> last()   // Hole den letzten Eintrag
  
union(tables: [firstEntry, lastEntry]) // Kombiniere beide Tabellen
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({"_value": r._value , "Funktion" : r.functionname }))
  |> toTime()
  |> rename (columns: {_value: "Zeitstempel"})
  |> yield(name: "mpitime")

panels.title: Erste und letzte ausgeführte MPI Funktion von Prozess $ProzessID

targets.query:
from(bucket: "hsebucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "libiotrace")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["jobname"] == "${jobname}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["filename"], set: [${filename:doublequote}]))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["processid"], set: [${ProzessID:doublequote}]))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["functionname"], set: ${functionname:json}))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "time_diff")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({"_value": r._value , "Funktion" : r.functionname }))
  |> group(columns: ["Funktion"])
  |> mean()
  |> rename(columns: {_value: "Laufzeit"})
  |> yield()

from(bucket: "hsebucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "libiotrace")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["jobname"] == "${jobname}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["filename"], set: [${filename:doublequote}]))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["processid"], set: [${ProzessID:doublequote}]))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["functionname"], set: ${functionname:json}))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "time_diff")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({"_value": r._value , "Funktion" : r.functionname }))
  |> group(columns: ["Funktion"])
  |> max()
  |> rename(columns: {_value: "Laufzeit"})
  |> yield()

from(bucket: "hsebucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "libiotrace")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["jobname"] == "${jobname}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["filename"], set: [${filename:doublequote}]))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["processid"], set: [${ProzessID:doublequote}]))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["functionname"], set: ${functionname:json}))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "time_diff")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({"_value": r._value , "Funktion" : r.functionname }))
  |> group(columns: ["Funktion"])
  |> min()
  |> rename(columns: {_value: "Laufzeit"})
  |> yield()

panels.title: Betrachtung der Funktionen innerhalb eines Prozesses

from(bucket: "hsebucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "libiotrace")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["jobname"] == "${jobname}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["filename"], set: [${filename:doublequote}]))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["processid"], set: [${ProzessID:doublequote}]))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "function_name" or r["_field"] == "time_diff" or r["_field"] == "traced_filename")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["functionname"], set: ${functionname:json}))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "time_diff")
  |> drop(columns: ["_measurement", "hostname", "jobname","_start", "_stop", "_time"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({Zeit: r._value, Funktion: r.functionname }))
  |> group(columns: ["Funktion"]) 
  |> sum(column: "Zeit") 
  |>group()

from(bucket: "hsebucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "libiotrace")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["jobname"] == "${jobname}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["filename"], set: [${filename:doublequote}]))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["processid"], set: [${ProzessID:doublequote}]))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["functionname"], set: ${functionname:json}))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "time_diff")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({"Prozess ID": r. processid, "Zeit in ns": r._value, Funktion: r.functionname, Datei: r.filename }))
  |> group(columns: ["Funktion"])
  |> mean(column: "Zeit in ns")
  |> group()

panels.title: Durchschnittliche Zeit in MPI-Funktionen von Prozess $ProzessID

targets.query:
ok = from(bucket: "hsebucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "libiotrace")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["jobname"] == "${jobname}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["filename"], set: [${filename:doublequote}]))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "return_state")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["functionname"], set: ["${functionname:json}"]))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_value"] == "ok")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({"_value": r._value}))
  |> count()
  |> rename(columns: {_value: "ok"})
  |> yield(name: "ok")

notok = from(bucket: "hsebucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "libiotrace")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["jobname"] == "${jobname}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["filename"], set: [${filename:doublequote}]))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "return_state")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["functionname"], set: ["${functionname:json}"]))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => not r["_value"] == "ok")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({"_value": r._value}))
  |> count()
  |> rename(columns: {_value: "not ok"})
  |> yield(name: "notok")

panels.title: Return Code Übersicht für MPI Funktion $functionname

targets.query:
import "math"

single = from(bucket: "hsebucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "libiotrace")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["jobname"] == "${jobname}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["filename"], set: [${filename:doublequote}]))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["functionname"], set: ["${functionname:json}"]))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "time_diff")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({mainstat: r._value, tmptitle: r.functionname, secondarystat: r.hostname, prozess: r.processid }))
  |> group(columns: ["tmptitle"]) 
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"]) 
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with counter: 1})) // Assign 1 to each row
  |> cumulativeSum(columns: ["counter"]) // Compute sequential identifiers
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with id: r.tmptitle + ":" + string(v: r.counter)}))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with title: r.tmptitle + ":" + r.prozess}))
  |> drop(columns: ["counter","prozess","tmptitle"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with key: "const" }))

cumulativeNode = from(bucket: "hsebucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "libiotrace")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["jobname"] == "${jobname}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["filename"], set: [${filename:doublequote}]))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["functionname"], set: ["${functionname:json}"]))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "time_diff")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({mainstat: r._value, title: r.functionname, prozess: r.processid, secondarystat: r.hostname }))
  |> group(columns: ["title"])
  |> sum(column: "mainstat")
  |> limit(n: 1)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ key: "const", MaxVal: r.mainstat }))
  
percent = join( tables: {const: cumulativeNode, data: single},on: ["key"], method: "inner")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with arc__percentage: if float(v:r.MaxVal) != 0.0 then math.round(x: (float(v: r.mainstat) / float(v: r.MaxVal)) * 100.0) / 100.0 else 0.0}))


mainNode = from(bucket: "hsebucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "libiotrace")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["jobname"] == "${jobname}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["filename"], set: [${filename:doublequote}]))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["functionname"], set: ["${functionname:json}"]))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "time_diff")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({mainstat: r._value, title: r.functionname, prozess: r.processid, secondarystat: r.hostname }))
  |> group(columns: ["title"])
  |> sum(column: "mainstat")
  |> group()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with id: 1})) // Assign 1 to each row
  |> cumulativeSum(columns: ["id"]) // Compute sequential identifiers
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with id: r.title}))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with secondarystat: "FA-Test"}))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with arc__percentage: 1.0}))

 final = union(tables: [percent, mainNode])
  |> drop(columns: ["key","MaxVal"])
  |> yield(name: "final")

import "strings"

edges = from(bucket: "hsebucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "libiotrace")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["jobname"] == "${jobname}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["filename"], set: [${filename:doublequote}]))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["functionname"], set: ["${functionname:json}"]))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "time_diff")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({mainstat: r._value, tmpsource: r.functionname, secondarystat: r.hostname}))
  |> group(columns: ["tmpsource"]) 
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"]) 
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with counter: 1}))
  |> cumulativeSum(columns: ["counter"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with source: r.tmpsource + ":" + string(v: r.counter)}))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with id: "edge:" + r.source}))
  |> drop(columns: ["counter","tmpsource"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with color: "blue"}))
  |> map(fn: (r) => {
    parts = strings.split(v: r.source, t: ":")
    return {id: r["id"],source: r["source"],mainstat: r["mainstat"],color: r["color"],secondarystat: r["secondarystat"],target: string(v: parts[0])}
  })
  |> yield(name: "edges")

writtenbytes = from(bucket: "hsebucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "libiotrace")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["jobname"] == "${jobname}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["filename"], set: [${filename:doublequote}]))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["processid"], set: [${ProzessID:doublequote}]))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["functionname"], set: ["MPI_File_write"]))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "function_data_written_bytes")
  |> drop(columns: ["_measurement", "hostname", "jobname", "_start", "_stop", "filename", "thread","_field","functionname"])
  |> map(fn:(r) => ({r with "_value": int(v: r["_value"])}))
  |> rename(columns: {_time: "Zeit", _value: "Bytes written", processid: "Prozess"})
  |> yield(name: "writtenbytes")

ersterEintrag = from(bucket: "hsebucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "libiotrace")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["jobname"] == "${jobname}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["filename"], set: [${filename:doublequote}]))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["processid"], set: [${ProzessID:doublequote}]))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["functionname"], set: ["MPI_File_seek"]))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "function_data_offset")
  |> drop(columns: ["_measurement", "hostname", "jobname", "_start", "_stop", "filename", "thread","_field","functionname"])
  |> map(fn:(r) => ({r with "_value": int(v: r["_value"])}))
  |> rename(columns: {_time: "Zeit", _value: "Offset", processid: "Prozess"})
  |> sort(columns: ["Zeit"], desc: false)
  |> limit(n: 1)

offsetNoDubs = from(bucket: "hsebucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "libiotrace")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["jobname"] == "${jobname}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["filename"], set: [${filename:doublequote}]))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["processid"], set: [${ProzessID:doublequote}])) 
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["functionname"], set: ["MPI_File_seek"]))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "function_data_offset")
  |> drop(columns: ["_measurement", "hostname", "jobname", "_start", "_stop", "filename", "thread","_field","functionname"])
  |> map(fn:(r) => ({r with "_value": int(v: r["_value"])}))
  |> rename(columns: {_time: "Zeit", _value: "Offset", processid: "Prozess"})
  |> sort(columns: ["Zeit"], desc: false)
  |> elapsed(timeColumn: "Zeit", unit: 1ns, columnName: "elapsed")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with adjustment: if exists r.elapsed and r.elapsed < 1000000 then 1000000 else 0}))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with neue_Zeit: int(v:r.Zeit) + int(v: r.adjustment) }))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with neue_Zeit: time(v: r.neue_Zeit)}))
  |> drop(columns: ["Zeit","elapsed","adjustment"])
  |> rename(columns: {neue_Zeit: "Zeit"})

union(tables: [ersterEintrag, offsetNoDubs])
  |> yield(name: "final")

readbytes = from(bucket: "hsebucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "libiotrace")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["jobname"] == "${jobname}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["filename"], set: [${filename:doublequote}]))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["processid"], set: [${ProzessID:doublequote}]))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["functionname"], set: ["MPI_File_read"]))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "function_data_read_bytes")
  |> drop(columns: ["_measurement", "hostname", "jobname", "_start", "_stop", "filename", "thread","_field","functionname"])
  |> map(fn:(r) => ({r with "_value": int(v: r["_value"]) * -1}))
  |> rename(columns: {_time: "Zeit", _value: "Bytes read", processid: "Prozess"})
  |> yield(name: "readbytes")

from(bucket: "hsebucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "libiotrace")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["jobname"] == "${jobname}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["filename"], set: [${filename:doublequote}]))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["processid"], set: [${ProzessID:doublequote}]))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "function_data_offset")
  |> drop(columns: ["_measurement", "hostname", "jobname","_start", "_stop", "_time"])
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["functionname"] == "MPI_File_seek")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({"Prozess ID": r. processid, Offset: r._value}))
  |> group()
  |> sort(columns: ["Offset"], desc: false)

panels.title: Offset der Prozesse bei MPI Seek für File: $filename

list.definition:
import "influxdata/influxdb/schema"

schema.tagValues(
  bucket: "hsebucket",
  tag: "jobname",
  predicate: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "libiotrace",
)
list.name: jobname

title: Visualisierung von MPI-File-I/O
